name: bobbyswebgames
description: A Vite + React playground that collects a set of casual web games. The first release ships the Memory Game—you memorize a random pattern on a 5x5 grid, then try to recreate it before the timer runs out. Additional titles (Simon Says, Connect Four, Spot the Difference, Tic Tac Toe) are scaffolded with routes and “Coming Soon” placeholders so each game can roll out independently.
